sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Navigate, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function CustomerReg() { const loginpage = useNavigate() const [data, setdata] = useState({ name: "", age: "", city: "", pincode: "", district: "", contact: "", email: "", password: "", gender: "", }); const changefn = (e) => { setdata({ ...data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const subfn = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("http://localhost:4000/registerCustomer", data) .then((res) => { console.log(res, "res"); if (res.data.status == 200) { alert("Registered Successfully"); loginpage('/login') } else if (res.data.status == 500) { alert(res.data.msg); } }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err, "err"); }); }; return (

Client Registration Form


); } export default CustomerReg;
